intent.why: TODO: Narrative or emotional purpose (e.g., 'Establish the cyberpunk world and protagonist's isolation')

cameraIntent.movement: TODO: Intended movement (e.g., 'slow push in' or 'tracking alongside')

shots.notes: EXAMPLE ONLY - Replace with actual shot intent in Phase 2

_INSTRUCTIONS.howToUse: This file defines WHAT happens in each shot and WHY, but does NOT contain camera specifics or final prompts. It's the creative intent layer.
_INSTRUCTIONS.timing: Align shot start times with music beat map created in Phase 2 init. Default duration is 8 seconds per shot.
_INSTRUCTIONS.characters: Reference character IDs from bible/characters.json. Multiple characters can appear in one shot.
_INSTRUCTIONS.locations: Reference location IDs from bible/locations.json. Only ONE location per shot.
_INSTRUCTIONS.cameraIntent: Describe feeling and approach, not technical camera specs. Technical specs go in prompt compilation.
_INSTRUCTIONS.status: Track production status: draft → approved → prompts_generated → rendered → final
_INSTRUCTIONS.phase2Workflow: 1) Generate music in Suno, 2) Note timestamps, 3) Create beat_map.json, 4) Create shot_plan.json with all shots, 5) Fill in shot intents
